meanings.definition: Large in quantity or number; abundant.
meanings.sent1: She had a copious amount of toys in her room.
meanings.sent2: The garden was filled with copious flowers of all colors.
meanings.sent3: The copious rain made the kids cancel their outdoor picnic.
meanings.sent4: His copious knowledge of history amazed his classmates.
meanings.sent5: The copious buffet at the party left everyone feeling satisfied.

meanings.sent1: The copious harvest of apples delighted the farmers.
meanings.sent2: The copious bookshelves in the library held a variety of books.
meanings.sent3: The copious laughter from the comedy show echoed through the theater.
meanings.sent4: Her copious energy seemed endless during the dance performance.
meanings.sent5: The copious amount of sunlight streaming through the window warmed the room.
